Title: Estoque
Description: Estoque is a Todo-App that comes with TFS integration an sync.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

Estoque is a Todo-App that comes with TFS integration an sync.

MustHaves

*Add Items
*Simple and fast use of the interface (adding items)
*Sync with TeamFoundationServer
*Parent (Scenario) - Child (Task) - Relation defines the interface
*Save only items that are not in the tfs
*Dark Skin to save energy ;)
